name: The Screaming Game
description:
Goal :

In this 2 player game, the goal is to get your character to scream as loud they can so that the opposing player's character explodes. Each player has a stamina bar, so if your character screams too quickly, you will have to wait until they catch their breath.

Whoever screams the loudest, wins.

Controls :
  1.  Tap the "W" key for Left Player Scream
  2.  Tap the "Up Arrow" for Right Player Scream
